description:
Brendan submitted his application online, and when I saw he was nearby, I knew we could easily setup a peep video.
I like having Ransom go by and set up the cameras and just let them do what they want. Occasionally the accidentally turn off the camera while man-handling it, so Ransom hovers nearby to make sure everything is going smoothly.
Brendan LOVED jerking for us, and even showed off his ass for us. Clearly the guy likes anal action, and boy does he shoot some distance. I am certain his black futon will be hard to clean up!
title: Brendan - peep
